narrative.iWantTo: I test SDK-s Page of Ticket Master Developer's site

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/sdks/) Verification for general page's elements
scenario.step: Then check general page elements for SDKs Page, where DISQUS = true and LeftMenu = true

scenario.title: (products-and-docs/sdks/) Verification for all the page's links

examples.step: When check visibility and click <elementKey> element of SDKs page
Then check that new page opened from SDKs page has <pageURL> and <pageTitle>
When check visibility and click SDK-Java Image element of SDKs page
Then check that new page opened from SDKs page has https://github.com/ticketmaster-api/sdk-java and //h1[@class='public ']/strong/a
When check visibility and click SDK-JavaScript Image element of SDKs page
Then check that new page opened from SDKs page has https://github.com/ticketmaster-api/sdk-javascript and //h1[@class='public ']/strong/a
When check visibility and click SDK-Scala Image element of SDKs page
Then check that new page opened from SDKs page has https://github.com/ticketmaster-api/sdk-scala and //h1[@class='public ']/strong/a
